title: Short Rest
content: Each party member heals for half their Hit Points maximum, rounded down. All Weapon Actions Bard: Bardic Inspirations (with Font of Inspiration at Level 5) Cleric: Channel Divinity Charges Druid: Wild Shape, Natural Recovery (Circle of Land) Fighter: Second Wind, Action Surge, Superiority Dice (Battle Master) Monks: Ki Points Paladin: Channel Oath Charges Ranger: Summon Companion (Beast Master) Warlock: Pact Magic Spell Slots, Misty Escape (Archfey), Dark One's Own Luck (The Fiend)
